Parameters:
field - What field are we going to edit permissions for?
enabled - If true, will allow editing of the permission matrix
justShowUser - Should be false when editing the self-permissions object

unregister

public void unregister()
Calling this method makes this component get rid of any secondary windows and to do some gc reference clearing.
